Cloud Native IoT Device Management

CSE-Q Team 7 ¬∑ Anurag University ¬∑ Mini Project 2025

üîç Project Overview

This cloud-native application manages and monitors IoT devices in real-time. With a scalable backend, MQTT simulation, and visually rich dashboard, it exemplifies a modern edge-cloud integrated IoT system.
